ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = < 763158003 |Medicinal product (product)| : 766952006 |Count of base of active ingredient (attribute)| = * , [0..0] 411116001 |Has manufactured dose form (attribute)| = *

description.value: Le jeu de valeurs à utiliser pour coder l'élément *code* de la ressource *FrMedicationNonproprietaryName*.
